mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dept WHERE dname LIKE '%'||#{dname}||'%' order by deptno

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sno, name, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS birth, final_degree, phone, address, account, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY sno ASC) AS row_num FROM STUDENT s WHERE 1=1 AND name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' AND FINAL_degree LIKE '%'||#{final_degree}||'%' ) WHERE row_num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT sno, name, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS birth, final_degree, phone, address, account, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date FROM STUDENT WHERE sno = #{sno}
SELECT count(*) FROM STUDENT WHERE 1=1 AND name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' AND FINAL_degree LIKE '%'||#{final_degree}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT values(stuno_seq.nextval, #{name}, to_date(#{birth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{final_degree}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{account}, to_date(#{reg_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDENT SET name = #{name}, birth = to_date(#{birth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), reg_date = to_date(#{reg_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), FINAL_DEGREE = #{final_degree}, PHONE = #{phone}, ADDRESS = #{address}, ACCOUNT = #{account} WHERE SNO = #{sno}
mapper.select: SELECT empno, deptno, ename, job, to_char(hiredate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HIREDATE, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS, ACCOUNT, SSNUM, SALARY, subject FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPNO = #{empno}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EMPPROFILE e WHERE empno = #{empno}
